title: Cheesy Italian tortellini
ingredients: ['225g beef mince', '225g Italian sausage, casings removed', '1 (400g) jar pasta sauce', '1/2 (300g) tin chopped mushrooms', '1 (400g) tin chopped Italian tomatoes & herbs, undrained', '1/2 (500g) packet refrigerated or fresh cheese tortellini', '110g grated mozzarella cheese', '70g grated Cheddar cheese']
